caption:
This photograph captures a scene of environmental degradation, specifically a devastated forest area that appears to have undergone extensive logging or a similar form of land clearing. The landscape is dominated by a steep, barren hillside covered with remnants of felled trees, including broken branches and tree stumps, indicating recent deforestation activity. The soil is exposed and appears heavily eroded, showcasing shades of brown and orange, which contrast starkly with the gray and white scattered debris of the trees.

In the foreground, a few upright trees remain standing, stripped of their lower branches, looking stark against the devastation. The background is shrouded in a dense mist or fog, lending an eerie atmosphere to the scene and highlighting the desolation of the landscape.

A rough dirt road cuts through the terrain, winding along the cleared hillside, and further emphasizes human intervention in this natural setting. The overall mood of the image is somber, with a focus on environmental impact and the stark reality of habitat destruction.
title: Road cut results in erosion in Olympic National Timberland, Washington. Near Olympic National Park.
